Array.pop|block: get and remove last value from %list
Array.shift|block: get and remove first value from %list
DCMotor.getDCMotorSpeed|block: get speed of DC Motor with ID $motorId
DCMotor.setDCMotorColor|block: set color of DC Motor with ID $motorId to $color
DCMotor.setDCMotorSpeed|block: set speed of DC Motor with ID $motorId to $speed
HeatSensor.getHeatSensorValueCelsius|blo: get value of heat sensor with ID $sensorId in Celsius
HeatSensor.getHeatSensorValueFahrenheit|: get value of heat sensor with ID $sensorId in Fahrenheit
HeatSensor.onHeatSensorValueChanges|bloc: when heat sensor with ID $sensorId value changes
HeatSensor.setHeatSensorBorderColor|bloc: set border color of heat sensor with ID $sensorId to $color
HeatSensor.waitUntilHeatSensorValueChang: wait until heat sensor with ID $sensorId value changes
LED.changeLEDBrightness|block: change brightness of LED with ID $ledId to $brightness
LED.changeLEDColor|block: change color of LED with ID $ledId to $color
LED.getLEDBrightness|block: get brightness of LED with ID $ledId
LED.getLEDColor|block: get color of LED with ID $ledId
LED.setLEDBlockColor|block: set border color of LED with ID $ledId to $borderColor
LED.setLEDColor|block: set color of LED with ID $ledId to $color
LightSensor.setLightSensorBorderColor|bl: set light sensor border color to $color
LightSensor.waitUntilLightSensorValueCha: wait until light sensor value changes
PressureSensor.getPressureSensorValue|bl: get value of pressure sensor with ID $sensorId
PressureSensor.setPressureSensorBorderCo: set border color of pressure sensor with ID $sensorId to $color
PressureSensor.waitUntilPressureSensorVa: wait until pressure sensor with ID $sensorId value changes
PressureSensor.whenPressureSensorValueCh: when pressure sensor with ID $sensorId value changes
ProximitySensor.getProximitySensorValue|: get value of proximity sensor with ID $sensorId
ProximitySensor.setProximitySensorBorder: set border color of proximity sensor with ID $sensorId to $color
ProximitySensor.waitUntilProximitySensor: wait until proximity sensor with ID $sensorId value changes
ProximitySensor.whenProximitySensorValue: when proximity sensor with ID $sensorId value changes
ServoMotor.getServoMotorPosition|block: get position of servo motor with ID $motorId
ServoMotor.setServoMotorBorderColor|bloc: set border color of servo motor with ID $motorId to $color
ServoMotor.setServoMotorPosition|block: set position of servo motor with ID $motorId to $position
Slider.getSliderValue|block: get value of slider with ID $sliderId
Slider.onSliderValueChanges|block: when slider with ID $sliderId value changes
Slider.setSliderBorderColor|block: set border color of slider with ID $sliderId to $color
Slider.waitUntilSliderValueChanges|block: wait until slider with ID $sliderId value changes
TiltSensor.isTiltSensorTilted|block: is tilt sensor with ID $sensorId tilted
TiltSensor.onTiltSensorTilted|block: when tilt sensor with ID $sensorId is tilted
TiltSensor.setTiltSensorBorderColor|bloc: set border color of tilt sensor with ID $sensorId to $color
TiltSensor.waitUntilTiltSensorTilted|blo: wait until tilt sensor with ID $sensorId is tilted
button.getButtonState|block: get state of Button with ID $buttonId
button.onButtonPressed|block: when Button with ID $buttonId is pressed
button.setButtonColor|block: set color of Button with ID $buttonId to $color
button.waitUntilButtonPressed|block: wait until Button with ID $buttonId is pressed
buzzer.setBuzzerColor|block: set color of Buzzer with ID $buzzerId to $color
buzzer.setBuzzerPitch|block: set pitch of Buzzer in variable $variable to $pitch Hz
buzzer.setBuzzerVolume|block: set volume of Buzzer in variable $variable to $volume
